csg/share/scripts/inverse/linsolve.py

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python2
00002 
00003 import numpy as np
00004 A = np.loadtxt('$name.gmc');
00005 b = np.loadtxt('$name.imc');
00006 
00007 x = np.empty([len(b),2])
00008 x[:,0]=b[:,0];
00009 x[:,1] = -np.linalg.solve(A,b[:,1]);
00010 
00011 np.savetxt('$name_out', x)
